name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Dive: AI Summary & Chat for YouTube, PDF, Web - Summarizer w/ Privacy

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: High-quality AI summary & chat w/ line references, sections, & more. Private via minimal permissions. Uses GPT-4o, Claude, & ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✅ Great for YouTube videos, PDFs, & any webpage
🤓 Summary w/ overview & bullets by section
💬 Chat Q&A: ask anything w/ line references
🦘 Jump to line/timestamp references — for every summary bullet, chat reply, or key phrase
😎 Highlighted key phrases & suggested follow-up questions to dive deeper
🌐 Multilingual support w/ translation for 60+ languages
🧠 Uses the latest tech from OpenAI GPT-4o / ChatGPT, Claude, & Gemini
🔒 Privacy-first: Extension can't access your browser data except when you use it on a webpage

➤ PRIVACY FIRST

The Dive can’t read your browser data except when you use it on a webpage. Unlike most extensions, we DON’T request permission to "Read and change your data on all websites" - because we don't need it! We believe great tools put privacy first.

➤ USE THE DIVE ON

- Blogs
- YouTube videos
- PDFs
- Long articles
- Academic papers
- Financial/legal documents
- and more!
